In 2022, we launched our Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) Roadmap, an important milestone 
in Methanex’s diversity and inclusion evolution. The roadmap lays out concrete steps 
we will take to cultivate a culture that celebrates and embraces diversity and ensures all 
team members feel a sense of belonging. We made considerable progress in our first year, 
building awareness through global communications and team conversations. Methanex is 
committed to continuously enhancing D&I long after Roadmap actions have concluded.2022 Progress on our  
Diversity and Inclusion Roadmap
